help.text: Welcome to Bella's Beauty Box, where you can make weird and funny costumes for your horse. If you've always wanted to see a horse with red hair and yellow socks, here's your chance. If you make something beautiful or interesting, you can mail it to your friends and see how they like it. Here's what you do: First, click on the hanger icon in the menu. Use the blue arrows to flip through the costume items. Click on an item to make it appear in the paintbox at the top of the screen. Click on one of the six main colors to choose that color for your item. If you don't want any of those, you can drag the slider bar to make your own color. When you've got a color you like, drag the item from the paintbox to the horse. Then you can flip through the costume items again to find other things. Click on the hanger icon to hide the panels. When you are done, click the printer icon to print off your fabulous creations and show them to the world!
